entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:32 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -20.2°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -22.4°C
Wind: SW 43 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
